patterns.title: All digits
patterns.notes: this should match all words with 1 or more digits in them by Blake Allen

patterns.title: Floating Point Regex 001
patterns.notes: This shouldn't match anything, useful for testing By Blake Allen

patterns.title: Vitamin B shortcode matcher
patterns.notes: Matches known vitamin short codes B1 B12 B6 etc. By Blake Allen

patterns.title: Medicine Tablet matcher
patterns.notes: Matches numbers that come before the word tablet(s)

patterns.title: Date regex 001
patterns.notes: Reg ex that matches all valid dates including leap years. Formats accepted mm/dd/yyyy or mm-dd-yyyy or mm.dd.yyyy https://stackoverflow.com/a/8768241/1404663

patterns.title: date regex 002
patterns.notes: this should match gregorian calendar dates such as xxxx-xx-xx, where separators '-' can be any character (.) by Blake Allen

patterns.title: General Date regex
patterns.notes: Matches XXXX-XX-XX XXXX/XX/XX XX/XX/XXXX where any character is allowed for separator

patterns.title: year | yo useful for finding words with year, or year old, case insentitve
X year, week, month, day old
patterns.notes: matches 20 year old accounting for the single space

patterns.title: Specific customer number
patterns.notes: matches **###/####, 2 letters with numbers and a separator

patterns.title: 2 letter code followed by numbers
patterns.notes: matches **# 2 letters and N digits in that order

patterns.title: Customer ident
patterns.notes: matches a string of 4 or more digits with 3 or more letters

groups.filter: known regex's to use to filter data
groups.extract: known data types used to extract data
